scripts.build: npm run clean && babel src -d lib
scripts.deploy-receive: npm run build && gcloud functions deploy receiveMessages --stage-bucket phev --trigger-topic receive
scripts.deploy-battery: npm run build && gcloud functions deploy battery --stage-bucket phev --trigger-http
scripts.deploy: npm run build && gcloud functions deploy dev_events --stage-bucket phev --trigger-topic my-device-events
scripts.deploy-ops: npm run build && gcloud functions deploy operations --stage-bucket phev --trigger-http
scripts.deploy-config: npm run build && gcloud functions deploy configChange --stage-bucket phev --trigger-topic config-change
scripts.deploy-auth: npm run build && gcloud functions deploy auth --stage-bucket phev --trigger-http
scripts.deploy-state: npm run build && gcloud functions deploy state --stage-bucket phev --trigger-topic my-device-state
scripts.deploy-alexa: npm run build && gcloud functions deploy alexa --stage-bucket phev --trigger-http
scripts.deploy-aircon-http: npm run build && gcloud functions deploy airConHttp --stage-bucket phev --trigger-http
scripts.deploy-aircon-event: npm run build && gcloud functions deploy airConEvent --stage-bucket phev --trigger-topic my-device-events
